title: Amber Rose gives birth to baby boy and gives him a very rock star name
text:
Amber and Alexander have welcomed their first baby together (Picture: Andrew Toth/Getty Images for Def Jam)

Amber Rose is a mum for the second time after welcoming her first child with boyfriend Alexander ‘AE’ Edwards.

The proud dad confirmed the news on Instagram, announcing: ‘Slash Electric Alexander Edwards.. the world is urs now.

‘Thank u @amberrose for loving me so much that u put ur body thru it 2 bring my sun in2 the world. I could never be as strong as u. Slash a rockstar.’

The model is already mum to six-year-old Sebastian, her son with ex-husband Wiz Khalifa.

Amber had previously told fans she was about to give birth by posting videos from the hospital, where AE was seen wearing protective clothing while chatting to Sebastian.

The star was pretty much ready to burst after passing the nine month mark four weeks ago, and jokingly told fans she was ‘still pregnant’ two days ago.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Amber announced that she was expecting her second baby boy back in April, when she shared a photo from a sonogram appointment.

She wrote: ‘AE and I are SUPER excited to announce that we have a Sweet little Baby Boy on the way! P.S Sebastian is soooooo Happy to be a big brother!’

Amber has a six-year-old son with her ex Wiz Khalifa (Picture: Albert L. Ortega/Getty Images)

Amber had quite the pregnancy (Picture: MEGA)

Edwards also shared his excitement at expecting his first child, writing on Instagram: ‘Even when it’s dark … my SON will shine. ❤️☀️✨🙏🏽 Thank u baby 4 my greatest gift. s*** wild! I love you 💕 I can’t wait to thug it out w my baby boy.

‘& baby boy, I promise I won’t get mad if ur first words r where the b****? [sic]’

However, Amber went on to have a difficult pregnancy, suffering from hyperemesis gravidarum – an extreme form of morning sickness also suffered by Kate Middleton and Amy Schumer.

She explained: ‘I said I was going to document this pregnancy a little bit more than I did with Sebastian, ’cause with Sebastian I had hyperemesis, and I have hyperemesis again with this baby. And for people that don’t know what it is, it’s basically extreme nausea, vomiting and dehydration.

Amber suffered from hyperemesis during her pregnancy (Picture: gotpap/Bauer-Griffin/GC Images)

‘I can eat a little bit more now cause I’m in my second trimester, but not much, and I pretty much sleep all day.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘But all in all, babies are a blessing, and God bless women, man. We are resilient, we get through it. You know, it’s really, really hard being pregnant.’

She continued: ‘To all the women out there who just pop out babies like it’s nothing, God bless you guys, because, oh my God, it’s a lot.’

‘I wanna be out, I wanna be cute, I wanna show off my belly, I just can’t get off this couch. Like, I’m tired and I just wanna barf all day. It’s just not fun, but it’s totally worth it.’

While Amber was struggling in the early months of her trimester, she was pictured glowing on a number of outings with AE, who boasted that their sex life was ‘different, but it’s fire’ while his girlfriend was pregnant.

Amber and AE, 32 – the vice president of A&R for Def Jam Records – have been dating since September 2018, although they first met in 2015 due to Edwards’ friendship with Tyga; the rapper has a son with Amber’s friend Blac Chyna.

SlutWalk activist Amber tied the knot with Wiz Khalifa in 2013 after two years together, welcoming their son the same year; however, Amber filed for divorce in September 2014.

The star famously dated Kanye West from 2008 until 2010, while she had a romance with 21 Savage from 2017 until early 2018.

description: Amber Rose is a mum for the second time after welcoming a baby boy with boyfriend Alexander 'AE' Edwards.
